```csharp
=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Index.razor
@page "/"
@inject ITodoItemService todoItemService

<h1>Todo List</h1>

<ul>
    @foreach(var item in todoItemService.GetItems())
    {
        <li>@item.Name</li>
    }
</ul>
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Index.razor

=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/ITodoItemService.cs
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor.Services
{
    public interface ITodoItemService
    {
        IEnumerable<TodoItem> GetItems();
    }
}
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/ITodoItemService.cs

=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoItemService.cs
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor.Services
{
    public class TodoItem
    {
        public string Name { get; set; }
    }

    public class TodoItemService : ITodoItemService
    {
        private List<TodoItem> _todoItems = new List<TodoItem>
        {
            new TodoItem { Name = "Complete assignment" },
            new TodoItem { Name = "Submit project" },
            new TodoItem { Name = "Prepare for meeting" }
        };

        public IEnumerable<TodoItem> GetItems()
        {
            return _todoItems;
        }
    }
}
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoItemService.cs
```
